TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowApplicationCompletedEventArgs extends System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs

summary.span: Provides information about a workflow instance that has completed its execution.

span.span: Provides information about a workflow instance that has completed its execution.

remarks.format: ## Examples Verifica se o exemplo de código a seguir a passado para o manipulador de um instância e exibe informações sobre como o fluxo de trabalho é concluído.The following code example inspects the passed into the handler of a instance and displays information about how the workflow completed. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CompletionState As ActivityInstanceState
public: property System::Activities::ActivityInstanceState CompletionState { System::Activities::ActivityInstanceState get(); };

summary.span: Gets the completion state of the workflow instance, which indicates whether the workflow instance completed successfully, was canceled, or faulted.

span.span: Gets the completion state of the workflow instance, which indicates whether the workflow instance completed successfully, was canceled, or faulted.

value.span: O estado de conclusão da instância do fluxo de trabalho, que indica se a instância de fluxo de trabalho foi concluído com êxito, foi cancelada ou com falha.

span.span: The completion state of the workflow instance, which indicates whether the workflow instance completed successfully, was canceled, or faulted.

summary.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the values of s of the workflow instance’s root activity, keyed by argument name.
